description:
When I film, I like to be a fly on the wall and let the boys have fun with each other. However, when you get two straight guys together, there is always some indoctrination that needs to take place.
I thought it would be fun to have Andrew and Heath watch a film that we did a while ago, in which Clay gets an expert blow job from Foster. You know, just to show them how it's done. I wanted Heath to give Andrew's hot cock a nice, thorough servicing. The boys were kind of awkward at first, but we kept the video playing and it wasn't long before they both had the hang of it!
title: Blow Jobs 101
